mapper.update: update t_club_appraising set year = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, clubId = #{clubId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, appraisingStart = #{appraisingStart,jdbcType=TINYINT}, appraisingResult = #{appraisingResult,jdbcType=TINYINT}, studentId = #{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, year, clubId, appraisingStart, appraisingResult, studentId from t_club_appraising
